as_of_version(version)

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 204
204:         def as_of_version(version)
205:           v = find_version(version)
206:           raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound.new("version #{version.inspect} does not exist for <#{self.class}:#{id}>") unless v
207:           obj = self.class.new
208: 
209:           (self.class.versioned_columns + [:version, :created_at, :created_by_id, :updated_at, :updated_by_id]).each do |a|
210:             obj.send("#{a}=", v.send(a))
211:           end
212:           obj.id = id
213:           obj.lock_version = lock_version
214: 
215:           # Need to do this so associations can be loaded
216:           obj.instance_variable_set("@new_record", false)
217: 
218:           # Callback to allow us to load other data when an older version is loaded
219:           obj.after_as_of_version if obj.respond_to?(:after_as_of_version)
220: 
221:           # Last but not least, clear the changed attributes
222:           if changed_attrs = obj.send(:changed_attributes)
223:             changed_attrs.clear
224:           end
225: 
226:           obj      
227:         end
build_new_version()

[Source]

    # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 76
76:         def build_new_version
77:           # First get the values from the draft
78:           attrs = draft_attributes
79: 
80:           # Now overwrite all values
81:           (self.class.versioned_columns - %w(version)).each do |col|
82:             attrs[col] = send(col)
83:           end
84: 
85:           attrs[:version_comment] = @version_comment || default_version_comment
86:           @version_comment = nil            
87:           new_version = versions.build(attrs)
88:           new_version.version = new_record? ? 1 : (draft.version.to_i + 1)
89:           after_build_new_version(new_version) if respond_to?(:after_build_new_version)
90:           new_version
91:         end

194:         end
default_version_comment()

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 100
100:         def default_version_comment
101:           if new_record?
102:             "Created"
103:           else
104:             "Changed #{(changes.keys - %w[version created_by_id updated_by_id]).sort.join(', ')}"
105:           end
106:         end
different_from_last_draft?()

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 259
259:         def different_from_last_draft?
260:           return true if self.changed?
261:           last_draft = self.draft
262:           return true unless last_draft
263:           (self.class.versioned_columns - %w(version)).each do |col|
264:             return true if self.send(col) != last_draft.send(col)
265:           end
266:           return false
267:         end
draft()

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 176
176:         def draft
177:           versions.first(:order => "version desc")    
178:         end
draft_attributes()

[Source]

    # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 93
93:         def draft_attributes
94:           # When there is no draft, we'll just copy the attibutes from this object
95:           # Otherwise we need to use the draft
96:           d = new_record? ? self : draft
97:           self.class.versioned_columns.inject({}){|attrs, col| attrs[col] = d.send(col); attrs }
98:         end
draft_version?()

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 180
180:         def draft_version?
181:           version == draft.version
182:         end

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 196
196:         def find_version(number)
197:           versions.first(:conditions => { :version => number })
198:         end

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 229
229:         def revert
230:           draft_version = draft.version
231:           revert_to(draft_version - 1) unless draft_version == 1
232:         end
revert_to(version)

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 245
245:         def revert_to(version)
246:           revert_to_without_save(version)
247:           save
248:         end
revert_to_without_save(version)

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 234
234:         def revert_to_without_save(version)
235:           raise "Version parameter missing" if version.blank?
236:           self.revert_to_version = find_version(version)
237:           raise "Could not find version #{version}" unless revert_to_version
238:           (self.class.versioned_columns - ["version"]).each do |a|
239:             send("#{a}=", revert_to_version.send(a))
240:           end  
241:           self.version_comment = "Reverted to version #{version}"
242:           self            
243:         end
save(perform_validations=true)

[Source]

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 108
108:         def save(perform_validations=true)
109:           transaction do
110:             #logger.info "..... Calling valid?"
111:             return false unless !perform_validations || valid?            
112:             
113:             if different_from_last_draft?
114:               #logger.info "..... Changes => #{changes.inspect}"
115:             else
116:               #logger.info "..... No Changes"
117:               return true
118:             end
119:             
120:             #logger.info "..... Calling before_save"
121:             return false if callback(:before_save) == false
122: 
123:             if new_record?
124:               #logger.info "..... Calling before_create"
125:               return false if callback(:before_create) == false
126:             else      
127:               #logger.info "..... Calling before_update"
128:               return false if callback(:before_update) == false
129:             end
130: 
131:             #logger.info "..... Calling build_new_version"
132:             new_version = build_new_version
133:             #logger.info "..... Is new version valid? #{new_version.valid?}"
134:             if new_record?
135:               self.version = 1
136:               #logger.info "..... Calling create_without_callbacks"
137:               if result = create_without_callbacks
138:                 #logger.info "..... Calling after_create"
139:                 if callback(:after_create) != false
140:                   #logger.info "..... Calling after_save"
141:                   callback(:after_save)
142:                 end
143:                 
144:                 if @publish_on_save
145:                   publish
146:                   @publish_on_save = nil
147:                 end                
148:                 changed_attributes.clear                                   
149:               end
150:               result
151:             elsif new_version
152:               #logger.info "..... Calling save"
153:               if result = new_version.save
154:                 #logger.info "..... Calling after_save"
155:                 if callback(:after_update) != false
156:                   #logger.info "..... Calling after_update"
157:                   callback(:after_save)
158:                 end
159:                 
160:                 if @publish_on_save
161:                   publish
162:                   @publish_on_save = nil
163:                 end 
164:                 changed_attributes.clear
165:               end
166:               result
167:             end
168:             true
169:           end
170:         end
save!(perform_validations=true)

     # File lib/cms/behaviors/versioning.rb, line 172

174:         end
